game.name: 星渊勇者 StarAbyss Heroes
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Torn by an ancient cataclysm, the world lies in ruins. In this ARPG, play a hero exploring relics, looting treasures, forging weapons, and mastering skills on a decaying yet fantastical journey.
